Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 about security challenges in natural language processing (NLP) focusing on black-box models, data leakage, backdoors, and imitation attacks
The Dark Side of Natural Language Processing
This article discusses the security challenges of black-box models in NLP and provides examples of data leakage, backdoors, and imitation attacks

This article provides a comprehensive survey of data leakage in NLP and discusses the potential risks and consequences of data leakage
